showed.from sentence: showed that a fine grained classification into 5 classes is a reasonable approximation to capture most of the data variation .

RNTN.from sentence: The RNTN gets the highest performance , followed by the MV - RNN and RNN .

bag of features baselines.from sentence: The recursive models work very well on shorter phrases , where negation and composition are important , while bag of features baselines perform well only with longer sentences .

combination of.from sentence: The combination of the new sentiment treebank and the RNTN pushes the state of the art on short phrases up to 85.4 % .
